phProblem.subject: Ph Intervention needed
phProblem.body:
Greetings,

The ph level of your filter unit {{device_id}} is {{ph_level}}, since it is over the established limit {{ph_limit}} we recommend a maintenance for your filter.

Best regards,

Our Team
